outputSpeech.text: Bowser Junior's up special, Abandon Ship!, has 3 parts.  initial is active frames 21 to 22.  explosion is active frames 60 to 61.  hammer is active frames 8 and  13. Bowser Junior can act on frame 40. You can ask about another one of Bowser Junior's moves, or name another character and move.
